upload2Commons-desc: Upload local files to a remote wiki using OAuth.
apihelp-upload-to-commons-summary: Upload a local wiki file to a remote wiki using OAuth.
apihelp-upload-to-commons-extended-descr:
The file must already be uploaded on the local wiki. Several methods are available:
* Upload from an on-wiki file, using the <kbd>localfilename</kbd> parameter.
* Upload from a stashed file, using the <kbd>filekey</kbd> parameter.
Note that the <kbd>filename</kbd>, <kbd>comment</kbd>, <kbd>tags</kbd>, <kbd>text</kbd> and <kbd>ignorewarnings</kbd> parameters are the same than in <kbd>[[Special:ApiHelp/upload|action=upload]]</kbd>.
apihelp-upload-to-commons-param-localfil: Name of a file to upload (without the "File:" namespace).
apihelp-upload-to-commons-param-filekey: Filekey of a stashed file to upload.
apihelp-upload-to-commons-param-tags: Change tags to apply to the upload log entry and file page revision on the remote wiki.
apihelp-upload-to-commons-param-text: Initial page text for new files. If not specified, the page text of the local file will be used instead.
apihelp-upload-to-commons-param-ignorewa: Ignore any warnings on the remote wiki.
apihelp-upload-to-commons-param-removeaf: Remove the stashed file if the upload succeeded (doesn't delete any already on-wiki files, see <kbd>[[Special:ApiHelp/delete|action=delete]]</kbd> for that).
apihelp-upload-to-commons-param-logtags: Set custom tags to the remoteupload log entry.
apierror-stashrequirefilename: You have to set a  <kbd>filename</kbd> when uploading from stash.
apierror-removeonlystash: The <kbd>removeafterupload</kbd> parameter can only remove stashed files. For already on-wiki files, see <kbd>action=delete</kbd>.
log-description-remoteupload: These events track when someone upload a file to the remote wiki using OAuth.
logentry-remoteupload-stashedfile: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has uploaded}} a file to the remote wiki: $6
